metadata.filename: Design of ultra-low and ultra-flattened dispersion single mode photonic crystal fiber by DE EDA algorithm.md
metadata.title: Design of ultra-low and ultra-flattened dispersion single mode photonic crystal fiber by DE EDA algorithm

references.content:
[1] Russell, P.S.J. J. Light Wave Technol. 2006, 24, 4729-4749.

tables.table_title: The solution (PCFs parameters) found by the three methods with the first cost function.
Dispersion value at $1.55 \mu \mathrm{~m}$ wavelength and dispersion slope over the C band for the PCFs found by the three methods with the first cost function.
The solution (PCFs parameters) found by the three methods with the second cost function.
Dispersion value at $1.55 \mu \mathrm{~m}$ wavelength and dispersion slope over C band for the PCFs found by the three methods with the second cost function.
